text.div:
BC BreastCancerTCategorySuffixCS CodeSystem

Codes that designate concepts describing T-category suffixes according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BreastCancerTCategorySuffixCS
title: BC BreastCancerTCategorySuffixCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Codes that designate concepts describing T-category suffixes according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol m in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol m in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
